completed_steps.summary: Classified as monorepo with 9 parts (2 apps + 6 packages + 1 e2e suite)
Found 65+ existing docs across root, docs/, apps/, packages/, _bmad-output/
Tech stack: Effect-ts 3.19, React 19, TanStack Start 1.132, Vite 7.1, Drizzle 1.0-beta.12, LangGraph 1.1, PostgreSQL 16, Redis 7, Better Auth 1.5-beta.11

Deep scan completed: 4 parallel agents scanned API/backend (14 endpoints, 8 use-cases, multi-agent system), frontend (9 routes, 60+ components), domain/infra (11 repo interfaces, 8 DB tables), CI/CD (GitHub Actions, 3 Docker environments, Playwright E2E)
